RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata

Added MetadataRightsList. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. Updated to 2.7.1. Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: ICME Event list of the ICME signature in-situ at ACE compared with CME at LASCO C2 or STEREO COR2. A comprehensive event list of chain of cause-effect of solar eruptive events from Sun to Earth. In this study, the tracking is carried out backward from the Earth to the Sun, starting from ICMEs observed at in-situ.

Parameter.Name: ICME EVENT START
Parameter.Description: Beginning of the ICME signature in-situ at ACE

Parameter.Name: ICME EVENT END
Parameter.Description: Estimated End of ICME signature in-situ at ACE

Parameter.Name: CME in LASCO
Parameter.Description: First appearance of the CME in LASCO C2, or STEREO COR2 in the event of a LASCO data gap.

Parameter.Name: ICME TYPE
Parameter.Description: Describes the signature in-situ, Shock Front (SH), MC (Magnetic Cloud), EJ (CME Ejecta Front)

Parameter.Name: AR
Parameter.Description: The Source Active region of the CME, if there is one

Parameter.Name: Surface Location
Parameter.Description: The location of the Active Region or, if there is no AR, the approximate location of the eruption.

Parameter.Name: Flare Magnitude
Parameter.Description: If the CME is associated with a flare, the strength of the flare.

Parameter.Name: Flare Onset Time
Parameter.Description: The beginning of the flare

Parameter.Name: SEEDS VEL C2
Parameter.Description: The velocity of the CME, as determined by the SEEDS C2 Catalog. These velocities are for quick reference only, and should not be taken at face value. There are different errors that are present in these velocities and they should not be used for an serious study or research work

Parameter.Name: SEEDS VEL A
Parameter.Description: The velocity of the CME, as determined by the SEEDS STEREO Catalog. These velocities are for quick reference only, and should not be taken at face value. There are different errors that are present in these velocities and they should not be used for an serious study or research work

Parameter.Name: SEEDS VEL B
Parameter.Description: The velocity of the CME, as determined by the SEEDS STEREO Catalog. These velocities are for quick reference only, and should not be taken at face value. There are different errors that are present in these velocities and they should not be used for an serious study or research work

Parameter.Name: AVG. VEL
Parameter.Description: The average velocity of the CME as calculated by determining the time of the CME in C2 and the beginning of the signature in-situ

Parameter.Name: Velocity
Parameter.Description: The average velocity of the ejecta at ACE

Parameter.Name: DST PEAK
Parameter.Description: The lowest value of the DST index

Parameter.Name: DST PEAK TIME
Parameter.Description: The time when the lowest value of the DST index occurs (as long as the peak is below -40)

Parameter.Name: EJECTA START TIME
Parameter.Description: The beginning of the CME Ejecta in-situ (if there is no shock this is the same as the ICME start time)

Parameter.Name: Quality Rating
Parameter.Description: This denotes the quality of the event's signature in-situ, 1 is the best, 3 is the worst.

Parameter.Name: In-Situ Link
Parameter.Description: A link to the in-situ data for the event

Parameter.Name: C2 Link
Parameter.Description: A link to a movie of the CME in LASCO C2

Parameter.Name: COR2 Link
Parameter.Description: A link to a movie of the CME in STEREO COR2

Parameter.Name: EIT/AIA Link
Parameter.Description: A link to a movie of the eruption on the Sun as seen by either the SOHO EIT or SDO AIA instrument
